meanings.definition: The state or quality of being foul.
meanings.sent1: The foulnesses of the garbage dump made me hold my nose.
meanings.sent2: The foulnesses of the swamp were evident in the putrid smell.
meanings.sent3: Despite the foulnesses of the situation, we managed to find humor in it.
meanings.sent4: The foulnesses of deceit can poison even the purest of intentions.
meanings.sent5: The foulnesses of the crime scene were etched in my memory forever.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are morally offensive or disgusting.
meanings.sent1: The foulnesses of his lies were finally exposed.
meanings.sent2: The foulnesses of corruption tarnished the reputation of the company.
meanings.sent3: The foulnesses of cheating in the game were met with disapproval.
meanings.sent4: The foulnesses of betrayal cut deep into their friendship.
meanings.sent5: The foulnesses of greed consumed him entirely.
